      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup getSpanSizeLookup()
      Returns the current used by the GridLayoutManager.
      void onMeasure(RecyclerView.Recycler recycler, RecyclerView.State state, int widthSpec, int heightSpec) 
      void setSpanSizeLookup(GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup spanSizeLookup)
      设置某个位置的item的跨列程度，这里和GridLayoutManager有点不一样， 如果你设置某个位置的item的span>1了，那么这个item会占据所有列

    • 方法详细资料

      • setSpanSizeLookup

        public void setSpanSizeLookup(GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup spanSizeLookup)
        设置某个位置的item的跨列程度，这里和GridLayoutManager有点不一样， 如果你设置某个位置的item的span>1了，那么这个item会占据所有列
        参数:
        spanSizeLookup - instance to be used to query number of spans occupied by each item

      • getSpanSizeLookup

        public GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup getSpanSizeLookup()
        Returns the current used by the GridLayoutManager.
        返回:
        The current used by the GridLayoutManager.

      • onMeasure

        public void onMeasure(RecyclerView.Recycler recycler,
             RecyclerView.State state,
             int widthSpec,
             int heightSpec)
